opinion: Every single time there has been a problem
cheese slices came on the side cold
The bartender was more concerned about socializing with a friend than waiting on me. Took 10 minutes to get her attention to order.
Burger came out wrong, not once, but twice. At least it still tasted good
rating it a 2-star instead of a 1-star
took them over 45 minutes for food at the bar while others that were seated after had food quickly. 20 mins to get a beer
I refuse to go there again
like they were covered in concrete
took forever to get the servers attention and then over 15 minutes to get them back
the girls seem to spend more time standing around talking to each other than doing their jobs and taking care of customers
should be at least mediocre to be acceptable
how this place is still in business is a miracle
